TopicTitle: Docking Spacecrafts in LKO (with Kraken attack) - KSP2 Walkthrough

Articles.Content:
Recalling the struggles I had in the past to learn how docking worked back in 2013, I thought it might be a good idea to make a video tutorial giving some tips for whoever may need it. 
Close to the end the Kraken decided to come and visit too!
I hope this can help in some way
https://youtu.be/tzliZCIKquE
